author: Gregor Kiczales
title: UBC Undergraduate Research Opportunities Student Club
question:
(posting this on behalf of UBC undergraduate opportunities)
Do you want to share your passion for research? Looking for a way to contribute to the UBC student community in a rewarding leadership position? Apply to be part of Undergraduate Research Opportunities's executive team for the 2023-2023 school year! No matter your background or level of experience, there are opportunities for everyone to get involved. As a multidisciplinary club, we welcome executives from all faculties. Applications are currently open for committee member and committee chair positions! 
Undergraduate Research Opportunities (URO) is a student-run research club striving to help undergraduate students along their research journey. We provide support and resources for undergraduates interested in getting involved in at UBC. Learn more about URO at www.uroubc.com and contact us at uro.ubc@gmail.com for any questions!

Apply here: https://ubc.ca1.qualtrics.com/jfe/form/SV_5aq9goBqK48VIvY 
Deadline: March 18, 2022 11:59 PM PST (Vancouver Time)
Position Descriptions: https://drive.google.com/file/d/1xK5ZvYMBkot_RJuUVu5DzndnCqX8WMTm/view?usp=sharing
